message:
Do you remember Codeschool? the website with the innovative way of teaching technical courses?
This is a free two days(48 hours) access to the full content of CodeSchool.com, I really recommend it to you all: http://go.codeschool.com/PUQelA
story: Mohammed El Sayed shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Code School
caption: codeschool.com
description: Code School teaches web technologies in the comfort of your browser with video lessons, coding challenges, and screencasts.
